value: Shalom this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries website is
wwwspa- on the shabbat shalom april the
19th 2014 19 de vivre and the fifth day
of unleavened bread and i have just a
very special message for this 5th day of
unleavened bread as we're in the midst
of passover and it has to do with the
ripped robe the high priest ripping his
robe and with Yahshua validating yash
was the high priest and if you go to
leviticus 21 verse 10 in the torah it
says and this is a commandment for the
high priest in terms of his garments it
says and he that is the high priest
among his brethren upon whose head the
anointing oil was poured and that is
consecrated to put on the garments shall
not uncover his head nor rent his
clothes so the high priests is commanded
in the law in the Torah that he is never
to uncover his head supposed to wear a
head covering and that he's not supposed
to rip or rent his garment I remember
the the garment he wore the high priests
crime of course he wore a lot of
different components to this garment
like the ephod and the and the high
priests had everything but the the
garment the long garment he wore was one
garment it was a one-piece woven from
the top to the bottom of one piece
garment he was never supposed to rip
that garment or it would invalidate him
as the high priest according to
Leviticus 2110 however many of you if
you remember the story of Yahshua during
his trial you go to Matthew 2665 Matthew
he questions the high priest questions
Yahshua asked him if he is the son of
yon and of course Yahshua says you know
you're going to see the Son of man
sitting on the right hand of power and
come into clouds of heaven basically
declaring himself to be Yahweh manifest
in the flesh and in Matthew 2665 the
high priest responds it says then the
high priest rent his clothes saying he
has spoken blasphemy what further need
have we have witnesses behold now we
have heard his blasphemy so in utter
rage and and discussed with Yahshua the
high priest Caiaphas he rips his garment
his high priest robe now by doing that
he violated Leviticus 2110 because he's
never allowed the high priest is never
allowed to rip his garment but he just
ripped it with his disgust over yash
were declaring himself to be Yahweh and
so he invalidating himself as the high
priest now look what happens to Joshua's
garment if you go to John chapter 19
verses 23 and 24 Yahshua is now hanging
on the cross on the verge of death and
it says then the soldiers when they had
crucified yash way they took his
garments and made for parts to every
soldier apart and also his coat now the
coat was without seeing woven from the
top throughout so Yahshua scope his
undergarment was almost identical to
what the high priest had also been
wearing and then in verse 24 it says
they said therefore among themselves let
us not rend it let us not tear this coat
but cast lots for it who is it shall be
that the scripture might be fulfilled
which says they parted my raiment among
them and for my vesture they did cast
lots these things there for the soldiers
did so the soldiers would not rip
yahshua's coat and why because even
though the high priest Caiaphas had
invalidated himself according to Torah
as the high priests because he ripped
his robe Yahshua was being shown to be
the true High Priest
no he wasn't from the tribe of Levi he
was from the tribe of Judah but he was
now being validated as the true
legitimate high priest because his
garment was not going to be ripped and
that is exactly what Leviticus 2110
specifies that the true high priest will
not rip his garment and even when
Yahshua was being crucified his his very
garment testified because it would not
even be ripped by his enemies and
testified that he was indeed the
legitimate and true high priest
hallelujah this is daniel john lee with
torah restoration ministries website is
ww spirit and tour com shabbat shalom
